com.simsilica.lemur.style

Class StyleTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.lemur.style.StyleTree

  • public class StyleTree
extends java.lang.Object
    Used internally by the Styles API to track the style definition hierarchy in tail-first form.
